name: Majexa
description: This game was made for our first Game Jam at Humber College's Game Programming Program. Credits: Group 11 Team: Team Lead: Schembri, William E. Artist: Moreira, Dylan M. Designer: Lizgold, Shon Sound: Mastrantoni, Matteo G. Programmer: Anderson-Saavedra, Mathew J. All Rounder: Crozier, Andrew K. All Rounder: Haylani, Tomas B. All Rounder: Karim, Muhammad W. Third Party Assets: Breitbarth. (2017) Deep In Space [Song]. Unity Asset Store. Esteban Mercado. (2018). Epic Boss Fight Loop [Song]. Unity Asset Store. Little Robot Sound Factory. (2015). Sci-Fi Sfx [Sound Effect Pack]. Unity Asset Store. Jalastram. (2014). SFX_Explosion_02 [Sound Effect] OpenGameArt. Layer Lab. (2021). GUI PRO Kit - Fantasy RPG [UI Asset]. Unity Asset Store. EVPO Games. (2019). 2D Pixel Spaceships (2 Small Ships + Explosions) [Sprite & Visual Assets]. Unity Asset Store.
